data.actual_result: You can choose a region for your server that should probably not be choosable
data.expected_result: Presumably, you shouldn't be able to select these regions as they are (old) VIP regions
data.short_description: There are more server options during iOS server creation than there should be
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server in the iOS client - You will see that there are certain regions (Amsterdam, Frankfurt) that shouldn't be there/don't appear in server creation on the desktop client - Once you've set that server up, if you try and change the region from the iOS client, you will not be able to select regions such as Amsterdam or Frankfurt
